00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTWNTODEBASEDCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTWNTODEBASEDCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include <boost/serialization/access.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/serialization/is_abstract.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include "AbstractOdeBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00036 #include "RungeKutta4IvpOdeSolver.hpp"
00037 #include "CvodeAdaptor.hpp"
00038 
00039 // Needs to be included last
00040 #include <boost/serialization/export.hpp>
00041 
00054 class AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel : public AbstractOdeBasedCellCycleModel
00055 {
00056 private:
00057 
00059     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00066     template<class Archive>
00067     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00068     {
00069         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractOdeBasedCellCycleModel>(*this);
00070     }
00071 
00072 protected:
00073 
00074 #ifdef CHASTE_CVODE
00075 
00076     static CvodeAdaptor msSolver;
00077 #else
00078 
00079     static RungeKutta4IvpOdeSolver msSolver;
00080 #endif //CHASTE_CVODE
00081 
00087     AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel(double lastTime)
00088         : AbstractOdeBasedCellCycleModel(lastTime)
00089     {
00090 #ifdef CHASTE_CVODE
00091         msSolver.CheckForStoppingEvents();
00092         msSolver.SetMaxSteps(10000);
00093         //msSolver.SetTolerances(1e-6, 1e-8);
00094 #endif //CHASTE_CVODE
00095     }
00096 
00100     virtual double GetOdeStopTime();
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00107     AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel();
00108 
00116     void ResetForDivision();
00117 
00124     void UpdateCellType();
00125 
00130     virtual void ChangeCellTypeDueToCurrentBetaCateninLevel()=0;
00131 
00132 };
00133 
00134 BOOST_IS_ABSTRACT(AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel)
